select.sql: select u.*, concat('',u2.Login,'') Admin, concat('',u.Login,'') Login, u.BanTime as DateBan from ut_users u left outer join ut_users u2 on u2.UserID=u.AdminID where u.BanTime>unix_timestamp(); order by BanTime asc
